panels.description: Status returned from the `/readyz` health status endpoint. Unhealthy reasons include beacon node problems, charon p2p problems, or validator client problems.
panels.title: Health Status

panels.description: Successful cluster duty percentage by type over the whole time range
panels.title: Cluster Duty Success(%)

panels.description:
Average beacon node score for the whole time window. The score is a combination of:
 - **errors**: the ratio or errors returned by the beacon node 
 - **latency**: how fast or slow the beacon node is responding


The performance of the Beacon node is critical to the performance of the validators and therefore rewards.

targets.expr:
(clamp(app_monitoring_readyz{job="charon"} == 1 OR app_monitoring_readyz{job="charon"} == 4 OR app_monitoring_readyz{job="charon"} == 5 OR app_monitoring_readyz{job="charon"} == 6, 1, 1) OR on() vector(0))
*
(
    (
0.5 * (1.0 - 10*(sum(increase(app_eth2_errors_total{job="charon"}[$__range])) / (sum(increase(app_eth2_latency_seconds_count{job="charon"}[$__range]))))) OR on() vector(0.5)
    )
    +
    (
        0.5 * (1.0 - clamp_max(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(app_eth2_latency_seconds_bucket{job="charon"}[$__range])) by (le)),1))
    )
)

panels.title: Beacon Node Score

panels.description:
Information about the charon cluster.

- **Network**: The blockchain network 
- **Operators/Nodes**: The number of operators or nodes or peers in the charon DV cluster.
- **Threshold**: The minimum number of participating nodes (also quorum).
- **Validators**: The number of validators added to the cluster, each validator is staking 32 ETH.

targets.expr:
( 1 * app_version{job="charon", cluster_network="mainnet"} )
or 
( 2 * app_version{job="charon", cluster_network="goerli"} )
or
( 3 * app_version{job="charon", cluster_network="sepolia"} )
or
( 4 * app_version{job="charon", cluster_network="gnosis"} )

panels.title: Cluster Info

panels.description:
- **Peer**: The peer's name (inferred from their *charon-enr-private-key*)
- **You**:  is this local charon node
- **Connected**: Whether you are currently connected to this peer.
- **Direct**: Whether the connection is *direct* () or *relay* () 
- **Latency**: The time messages take to travel to/from the peer.
- **Version**: The version of the peer's charon node
- **Supported**: Whether the peers charon version is supported/compatible or not.
- **Uptime**" The duration since peer was restarted.
- **Attest**: Number of attestation duties missed in the time window.
- **Propose**: Number of block proposal duties missed in the time window.
- **Other**: Number of other duties missed in the time window.

targets.expr:
(
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{job="charon", duty="attester"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
/
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{job="charon", duty="attester"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
) OR on() vector(0)

(
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{job="charon", duty=~".*proposer"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
/
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{job="charon", duty=~".*proposer"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
) OR on() vector(0)

(
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_missed_total{job="charon", duty!~"(proposer|attester)"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
/
    sum(increase(core_tracker_participation_expected_total{job="charon", duty!~"(proposer|attester)"}[$__range])) by (peer) 
) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Peer Connectivity and Missed Duties ()
